message.body: Hey this is Antonia! Is the key still in the mailbox for today? See you at 5:15/5:30ish?
Never mind I got it from the mailbox! We might head to the park it's so beautiful out.
Just to make sure you know-I am not available to watch Ella on Christmas Eve or New Year's Eve which are both Mondays. But I am available all Mondays before! See you tomorrow.
Oh yeah, I figured! We are getting out of the city those days anywayz. Also, Ella's dad is going to be coming here tomorrow, so I will just leave cash in the envelope with the keys!
Oh okay cool. What time should I expect Wes?
He said he gets done at four or four thirty, so I figured he would be west when I would normally be home
Okay sounds good!
Hey lady, there is a review session tonight, is there anyway you could stay till 8? We could drive you home after
Yeah sure that's fine!
Adam can pick me up no problem. I hate to be a bother but you owe me $3 from two weeks ago...no worries about tonight we'll play and do homework :-)
Awesome, cool and yes, I do owe you three bux!
Haha cool see you later. Hope studying goes well.
Thanks! Almost over!
Hey thanks again for the extended night! I am heading to review session now, I will let u know when I am leaving so you can get in touch with Adam!
Oh perfect cool.
Thanks
Homeward bound
Hey, I'm sorry I didn't clarify sooner, but I just want to make sure you know that I don't need a sitter again until the week of the 22nd. As long as I'm on break I can work while Ella is in school.

Also, if this is at all possible, would you be able to switch to Wednesdays starting that week? I know you moved things around, so if that is a problem, lets keep things as they are! Let me know, thanks!

So January 28th would be the be the next Monday you need a sitter? I cannot change to Wednesdays after changing my schedule around once already sorry! (The 21st is MLK day, so maybe you do need a sitter if you don't have off of school yourself?)
No problem, I need someone multiple days this semester, so Monday is great! I'm off on mlk day, so yes, the 28 th would be the first day.
Cool sounds good. See you then!
Awesome!
Do you know anyone who would want to take in a kitty or two? We need to find homes for our guys, they are hard on Ella's asthma
Sorry none are coming to mind but I'll ask around!
Thanks! Just putting the word out

Hey hope all is well! Just a question-I am interested in babysitting for two kids on Monday February 4th at 5:45. Is there a way you could be back before 5:30 on that Monday? And if not is there a way you could find another sitter? If neither is possible
Hey! Yes, I will make sure of it, I could probably be back by five
Thanks a bunch!!
See u tonight around 5:30!
Sounds like a plan!
Yeah sure.
Is it ok to push back my return to 6?
Thanks!!
On my way!
Cool!
Hey, just so you know, it will be my boyfriend getting there at five tonight, just so you are not surprised. His name is Nate, I think you met him at dock street
Also, be warned, I'm waiting for a bed to be delivered, so my house is complete chaos right now, but Ella's room is mostly ok ha
Haha okay thanks for the warning! Thanks for being flexible with the time today.
No problem, thanks for hanging with the small fry every week
No prob. Enjoy your weekend.
Good to know, thanks!
This is Antonia on a new (old) number! Thanks, all.
